description:
Today, we chat with Luke Hawker about his vast experience in Middle-earth and filmmaking over the past 25 years!  Not only has he been in front of the camera under prosthetics and in motion capture, but he also works in creating effects and props!  In our long chat, we talk about his time on The Lord of the Rings, The Hobbit, Rings of Power, plus other films like Godzilla x Kong and Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes!  Luke also shares funny stories from the set, like goofing off with Jed Brophy and getting tossed around by Ismael Cruz Córdova.


If you're interested in Luke's Sauron miniature statue, check it out here:

https://www.collectorzown.com/products/pre-order-weta-workshop-the-lord-of-the-rings-sauron-miniature-statue?_pos=1&_sid=c3397f288&_ss=r
(Save 15% with code NOTR)
-or-
https://www.wetanz.com/us/sauron-mini-statue

#lordoftherings #ringsofpower #planetoftheapes
title: Luke Hawker talks mo-cap, LOTR, Rings of Power, & Wētā Workshop pranks!
Sauron Miniature Statue | Wētā Workshop Unboxing
